titleStmt.title: A litel treatise ageynste the mutterynge of some papistis in corners
titleStmt.author: Swinnerton, Thomas, d. 1554.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Swinnerton by John Bale.
At foot of title: Cum priuilegio.
Identified as STC 19177 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
